content.query:
GitHub_CL
| sort by TimeGenerated desc
| top 1 by TimeGenerated
| extend TimeGenerated = TimeGenerated
| extend AuditEntries = todynamic(parse_json(value_s))
| mv-expand AuditEntries
| evaluate bag_unpack(AuditEntries)
| extend createdAt_ = tostring(parse_json(node).createdAt)
| extend action_ = tostring(parse_json(node).action)
| extend userLogin_ = tostring(parse_json(node).userLogin)
| extend organizationName_ = tostring(parse_json(node).organizationName)
| extend TimeGenerated = createdAt_
| where action_ == "org.add_member" or action_ == "org.remove_member"
| extend MemberName = userLogin_
| extend Action = iif(action_=="org.add_member", "Added", "Removed")
| extend Organization = organizationName_
| sort by TimeGenerated desc
| project MemberName, Action, Organization
content.title: Members Added or Removed

content.query:
GitHub_CL
| sort by TimeGenerated desc
| top 1 by TimeGenerated
| extend TimeGenerated = TimeGenerated
| extend AuditEntries = todynamic(parse_json(value_s))
| mv-expand AuditEntries
| evaluate bag_unpack(AuditEntries)
| extend action_ = tostring(parse_json(node).action)
| extend Visibility = tostring(parse_json(node).visibility)
| extend Organization = tostring(parse_json(node).organizationName)
| extend RepoName = tostring(parse_json(node).repositoryName)
| extend Actor = tostring(parse_json(node).actorLogin)
| where action_ == "repo.create"
| project RepoName, Actor, Organization, Visibility
content.title: Repositories Created

content.query:
GitHubRepoLogs_CL
| extend TimeGenerated = createdAt_t
| where LogType_s == "Clones"
| summarize count() by bin(TimeGenerated, 1d), Repository_s
content.title: Clone count by Repository Over Time

content.query:
GitHubRepoLogs_CL
| extend TimeGenerated = createdAt_t
| where LogType_s == "vulnerabilityAlerts"
| summarize count() by bin(TimeGenerated, 1d), OrgName_s
content.title: Vulnerability Alerts Count by Repoistory over Time

content.query:
GitHub_CL
| sort by TimeGenerated desc
| top 1 by TimeGenerated
| extend TimeGenerated = TimeGenerated
| extend AuditEntries = todynamic(parse_json(value_s))
| mv-expand AuditEntries
| evaluate bag_unpack(AuditEntries)
| extend action_ = tostring(parse_json(node).action)
| where action_ == "team.add_repository" or action_ == "team.remove_repository"
| extend Organization = tostring(parse_json(node).organizationName)
| extend RepoName = tostring(parse_json(node).repositoryName)
| extend TeamName = tostring(parse_json(node).teamName)
| extend Action = iif(action_=="team.add_repository", "Added", "Removed")
| project Organization, RepoName, TeamName, Action
content.title: Teams Added/Removed Repository

content.query:
GitHub_CL
| sort by TimeGenerated desc
| top 1 by TimeGenerated
| extend TimeGenerated = TimeGenerated
| extend AuditEntries = todynamic(parse_json(value_s))
| mv-expand AuditEntries
| evaluate bag_unpack(AuditEntries)
| extend Node_Action = tostring(parse_json(node).action)
| extend Node_OperationType = tostring(parse_json(node).operationType)
| extend Node_Visibility = tostring(parse_json(node).visibility)
| extend Organiation = tostring(parse_json(node).organizationName)
| extend Repo = tostring(parse_json(node).repositoryName)
| extend Actor = tostring(parse_json(node).actorLogin)
| where Node_Action == "repo.access" and Node_OperationType == "MODIFY" and Node_Visibility == "PUBLIC"
| project Organiation, Repo, Actor
content.title: Private Repos made Public
